item.title: 埃尔-埃里安称沃什作为财政部领导人将尊重美联储的自主权
item.description: 穆罕默德-埃里安（Mohamed El-Erian）表示，如果当选总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）选择凯文-沃什（Kevin Warsh）担任财政部长，他将尊重美联储的独立性。【原文：Kevin Warsh will respect the independence of the Federal Reserve should he be chosen by President-elect Donald Trump for Treasury secretary, according to Mohamed El-Erian.】

item.title: 亚马逊向人工智能公司 Anthropic 追加投资 40 亿美元
item.description: 亚马逊公司正在增持 OpenAI 竞争对手 Anthropic 的股份，后者是 Claude 生成式人工智能软件的开发商。【原文：Amazon.com Inc. is boosting its stake in OpenAI rival Anthropic, builder of the Claude generative artificial intelligence software.】

item.title: 阿布扎比阿德诺克公司据说考虑出售天然气部门的股份
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，阿拉伯联合酋长国的国有能源公司正在权衡进一步出售其天然气业务股份的计划。【原文：The United Arab Emirates’ state energy company is weighing plans to sell a further stake in its gas business, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 科技公司为上市而战，超级微型投资者大受打击
item.description: 超微计算机公司（Super Micro Computer Inc. ）股价的过山车走势可能会持续一段时间，因为投资者正在权衡该公司为避免被纳斯达克公司（Nasdaq Inc.【原文：A roller-coaster ride for Super Micro Computer Inc. shares is likely to continue for some time, as investors weigh the company’s next steps to avoid being delisted by Nasdaq Inc.】

item.title: 美联储帮助主干道的大流行病计划现在成了企业的负担
item.description:
通过 "大街贷款计划 "发放的贷款违约率激增，专家称这仅仅是个开始

。【原文：

Defaults have surged for loans made through the Main Street Lending Program, and experts say it’s just the beginning

】

item.title: 经济学家认为通胀顽固，美联储降息步伐渐缓
item.description: 经济学家认为，美联储明年将采取更加谨慎的降息措施，因为通胀顽固，而且在当选总统唐纳德-特朗普的领导下，物价压力降温的前景有限。【原文：Economists see the Federal Reserve taking a more measured approach to interest-rate cuts next year amid stubborn inflation and limited prospects that price pressures can cool much under President-elect Donald Trump.】

item.title: 马蒂-弗里德森说：私人信贷和美联储看跌期权压垮了垃圾股利差
item.description: 垃圾债券大师马蒂-弗里德森（Marty Fridson）认为，私人债务激增、央行支持、国债收益率高企以及投资者基础的变化，使得信用利差被人为地紧缩。【原文：The private debt boom, central bank support, high Treasury yields and investor base changes are keeping credit spreads artificially tight, according to junk bond guru Marty Fridson.】

item.title: 维勒鲁瓦称欧洲央行 "非常有信心 "实现通胀目标
item.description: Francois Villeroy de Galhau 表示，欧洲中央银行 "非常有信心 "能够持续实现 2% 的通胀目标，甚至会比其 9 月份预测中的预期提前实现这一目标。【原文：The European Central Bank is “very confident” it will sustainably reach its 2% inflation target and should even get there earlier than expected in its September forecasts, Francois Villeroy de Galhau said.】

item.title: 印度外汇储备创历史最大单周降幅
item.description: 印度外汇储备创下有史以来最大单周跌幅，表明央行很可能在市场上抛售美元，以支撑本周跌至历史新低的本币。【原文：India’s foreign reserves had their biggest weekly fall ever, indicating the central bank likely sold dollars in the market to support the local currency that fell to a record low this week.】

item.title: Pythagoras Crypto 基金回报率达 230%，超过比特币涨幅
item.description: 去年年底，米切尔-董（Mitchell Dong）发现了一个机会：现货比特币 ETF 即将面向美国投资者，他希望自己的加密对冲基金能提供一种性能更好的竞争产品。【原文：Mitchell Dong spied an opportunity late last year: Spot-Bitcoin ETFs were coming to US investors soon, and he wanted his crypto hedge fund to offer a competing product that performed even better.】

item.title: 加拿大零售业在第四季度开始时加速反弹
item.description: 加拿大零售销售连续第四个月增长，这是自 2022 年初以来最长的连续增长期，表明央行的降息措施正在刺激消费支出。【原文：Canadian retail sales rose for the fourth straight month, the longest growth streak since early 2022, signaling the central bank's interest-rate cuts are boosting consumer spending.】

item.title: 战时医疗创新降低了以色列部队的死亡率
item.description: 可避免重大脑损伤的定制头盔。战场上的移动血库和初步手术。可播报医疗数据的狗牌。用直升机将伤员送往医院，以分钟为单位。缓解疼痛的芬太尼棒棒糖。【原文：Custom-designed helmets that stave off major brain injuries. Mobile blood banks and preliminary surgery on the battlefield. Dog tags that broadcast medical data. Evacuation by helicopter to hospitals, measured in minutes. Fentanyl lollipops to ease the pain.】

item.title: 森特诺表示，如果风险显现，欧洲央行可讨论更大幅度的减息措施
item.description: 欧洲中央银行管理委员会成员马里奥-森特诺说，如果该地区经济面临的一些危险成为现实，可以讨论更大幅度的降息。【原文：European Central Bank Governing Council member Mario Centeno said larger reductions in interest rates can be debated if some of the dangers to the region’s economy come to pass.】

item.title: 英国预算案首次测试显示第四季度经济增长将受冲击
item.description: 周五的一系列数据显示，英国预算案对实体经济的打击初露端倪，其中包括企业对财政大臣雷切尔-里夫斯（Rachel Reeves）的财政计划 "明确表示反对"。【原文：The first signs of the real economy hit from the UK budget appeared in a raft of data on Friday that included a “clear thumbs down” from companies about Chancellor of the Exchequer Rachel Reeves’ fiscal plans.】

item.title: 国际清算银行称高频交易导致流动性短缺加剧
item.description: 国际清算银行称，随着算法交易的兴起和市场分割的加剧，金融市场更容易出现流动性短缺。【原文：Financial markets have become more susceptible to liquidity shortages with the rise of algorithmic trading and increased market fragmentation, according to the Bank for International Settlements.】

item.title: 量化对冲基金 AQR 正在削减富裕客户的所得税税单
item.description: 量化对冲基金 AQR 资本管理公司（AQR Capital Management）正在悄悄地兜售一种产品，这种产品可以做一些非同寻常且可能引起分歧的事情：帮助减少投资者需要缴纳的所得税。【原文：Quant hedge fund AQR Capital Management is quietly touting a product that can do something extraordinary and potentially divisive: help slash how much income tax its investors have to pay.】

item.title: 亿万富翁卢克希奇家族向桑坦德银行和普华永道寻求 2.17 亿欧元赔偿
item.description: 智利亿万富翁卢克希奇家族正就一家西班牙贷款机构七年前倒闭一事向桑坦德银行、普华永道会计师事务所和其他机构寻求 2.17 亿欧元（2.26 亿美元）的赔偿。【原文：Chile’s billionaire Luksic family is seeking €217 million ($226 million) in compensation from Banco Santander SA, PriceWaterhouseCoopers LLP and others in connection to the collapse of a Spanish lender seven years ago.】

item.title: 施莱格尔称，瑞士央行的资产规模太小，无法应对资产负债表风险
item.description: 瑞士国家银行行长马丁-施莱格尔（Martin Schlegel）表示，目前瑞士国家银行的资产净值相对于其庞大的资产负债表所带来的风险而言过低。【原文：The Swiss National Bank’s equity is at the moment considerably too low for the risks its large balance sheet poses, according to President Martin Schlegel.】

item.title: 墨西哥通胀和经济增长缓慢，减产仍在进行中
item.description: 墨西哥的通胀率在 11 月初有所下降，同时经济继续失去动力，这为央行下个月连续第四次降息提供了空间。【原文：Mexico’s inflation decelerated in early November while the economy continues to lose momentum, giving the central bank room to cut interest rates for a fourth straight meeting next month.】

item.title: 锂的反弹更像是昙花一现而非复苏
item.description:
由于供应仍然远远超过需求，近期的价格上涨不太可能成为市场的转折点。【原文：

With supply still running well ahead of demand, recent price gains are unlikely to be a turning point for the market.

】

item.title: 苹果、谷歌将就移动浏览器主导地位接受英国调查
item.description: 英国反垄断监管机构在一项临时决定中表示，苹果公司（Apple Inc.【原文：Apple Inc. and Alphabet Inc. are set to face a formal investigation over their dominance of web browsers on cell phones, the UK’s antitrust regulator said in a provisional decision aimed at curbing the tech giants’ stranglehold on mobile operating systems.】

item.title: 无与伦比的美股让分散投资者望尘莫及
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）在选举中获胜后，"美国优先"（America First）的交易在本周再次兴起，银行和小型公司昨日推动股市不断走高。尽管最近出现了一些与货币相关的不安情绪，但投资者仍在继续押注特朗普的政策议程--包括放松监管和促进国内企业战胜外国竞争对手的举措--将为美国股市长期以来优于全球市场的表现再添一把火。【原文：The “America First” trade that surged in the immediate aftermath of Donald Trump’s electoral victory is on display again this week, with banks and smaller companies pushing the stock market ever higher yesterday. Despite some recent monetary-related jitters, investors are continuing to bet that Trump’s policy agenda -- including de-regulation and moves to boost domestic business over foreign competitors -- will add fresh fuel to the long-standing outperformance of US equities over world markets.】

item.title: 反对党支持的候选人在雅加达省长竞选中领先
item.description: 据最新调查显示，在距离雅加达地区选举不到一周的时间里，印尼反对党支持的一名候选人在关键的雅加达省长竞选中处于领先地位。【原文：A candidate backed by Indonesia’s opposition has taken the lead in the pivotal race for Jakarta governor less than a week before the regional elections, according to the latest survey.】

item.title: 资通公司考虑将米兰办事处迁至意大利，以瞄准意大利的私人交易
item.description: 另类资产管理公司战神管理公司（Ares Management Corp.【原文：Alternative asset manager Ares Management Corp. is considering setting up shop in Milan to target lending opportunities to businesses that currently lack access to private credit.】

item.title: 匈牙利认为制裁俄罗斯天然气工业银行是对能源安全的威胁
item.description: 匈牙利说，美国制裁俄罗斯天然气工业银行的决定危及一些中欧国家的能源安全，增加了俄罗斯提前切断向欧洲大陆输送天然气的风险。【原文：Hungary said the US decision to sanction Gazprombank jeopardizes the energy security of some central European countries, elevating the risks of an early cutoff of Russian gas to the continent.】

item.title: 美国调查摩根大通与伊朗石油大亨对冲基金的关系

item.title: 德意志银行称监管机构首次对放宽规则持开放态度
item.description: 德意志银行（Deutsche Bank AG）首席执行官克里斯蒂安-斯温（Christian Sewing）说，他看到欧洲官员们前所未有地愿意减轻该地区经济的监管负担。【原文：Deutsche Bank AG Chief Executive Officer Christian Sewing said he sees an unprecedented readiness among European officials to alleviate the regulatory burden on the region’s economy.】
